description: Identifies use of Fodhelper.exe to bypass User Account Control. Adversaries use this technique to execute privileged processes. Author: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Tony Lambert), oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Legitimate use of fodhelper.exe utility by legitimate user
name: Bypass UAC via Fodhelper.exe
